title: Avail NOW LARGE STUDIO,   Bart / UCB, FREE bus to Cal
posting_body: ['Clean & Disinfected !!!', 'Pls Send self-introduction (e.g. occupation, if in school year/major) to BerkeleyRent at Y a h o o', 'Will provide "virtual tour" by video', 'if you are still interested, personal viewing available', 'Pls provide TELEPHONE NUMBER for appointment to view', '(due to Covid, we limit showings to serious qualified tenants only)', 'Early Bird special: apply at first open house & sign lease in 24 hours after credit approval:', 'reduced from $1,699/month to:', '$1,499, August to December 2022', '$1,599, January to July 2023', 'Annual lease', 'Corner unit or top (2nd) floor +$20.', "Add'l person + $100 (reduced from $150)", 'ONLY a few units available this year, act fast !!!', 'Additional tenant, + $100 per month (discount from $150)', 'Corner unit or top (2nd) floor add $20/m', "SPACIOUS & Beautiful Remodeled Studio, not someone's basement in-law unit, no sharing :-)", 'Address: Curtis Street, North of University Avenue.', 'Pls email us your self-introduction (e.g. occupation, if in school, year/major)', 'Spacious cozy studio in a quiet, clean and safe bldg.', '(sorry no elevator), lots of light, window view of frolicking squirrels.', 'High-quality BERBER wall', 'to wall carpet', "Studio is about 13.5' X 13' + private kitchen about 13' X 8' (gas stove) + private bathroom with full-sized bathtub + big walk-in closet.", 'photo shows a sample corner unit', 'Friendly, quiet neighborhood with shopping, ethnic restaurants, pubs and clubs, near BART, AC transbay bus service to SF, AMTRAK, Hwy 80, Marina and shoreline.', 'Walking and biking distance to Downtown Berkeley', '10 blocks West from UC Berkeley campus; 5 blocks of North Berkeley Bart', 'Bus on corner, 6 minutes ride to UCB.', 'Free bus pass for Cal students.', 'Tenants pays own P G & E and Wifi, and share of Water, Sewage, and Garbage.', 'Landlord pays other utilities.', 'Laundrymat at corner.', 'Outdoor off street parking space maybe available for $100 per month.', 'Require 1st month rent & 1 month deposit to move-in.', 'Full-time students or No local employment for 2 years pls prepare to have a co-signer.', 'Sorry no pets', 'Thank you very much :-)']
